docTitle.titlePart: B2 Diagrams and Bhabha Equation with Mass Matrix *

byline.affiliation: Institut fur Theoretische Physik I der Universität Münster

front.div:
Till now nearly all papers about the Bhabba equation treat equations with a mass term ml.
This is merely a matter of mathematical simplicity, because we will see in this work that important
physical fields can only be described by a mass term 4= ml. The second aim of this publication is
to derive a constructive procedure for the calculation of the representations of the Bhabha equa-
tion and the tensor and spinor field equations, which are equivalent to them.
